string.text: Tools: Bring tools to Stoepka.

Stoepka has asked to find two sets of tools: one for precision work, the other for rough work. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can provide more serious upgrades to weapons or body armor.
Tools: bring tools to Stoepka

Stjepka has asked to find two sets of tools, one for rough work and one for calibration. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can also provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armor.
Tools: bring tools to Stoepka
Stoepka has asked to find a set of tools for rough work. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armour.
Tools: Bring tools to Stoepka

Stjepka has asked to find two sets of tools, one for fine work and one for calibration. Not only will the wizard pay for the tool, but he can also provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armour.
Tools: bring tools to Stoepka
Stoepka has asked to find a set of tools for precision work. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can also provide a more serious upgrade to his weapon or body armour.
Tools: Bring tools to Stoepka
Stjepka has asked to find a set of tools for calibration. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can also provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armour.
Tools: Bring tools to Stoepka

Stjepka has asked to find three sets of tools: for rough work, for precision work plus a calibration set. Not only will the wizard pay for the tool, but he can provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armor.
Tools: bring tools to Barkas

Stjepka has asked to find two sets of tools, one for precision work and one for rough work. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can also provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or armour.
Tools: bring tools to Barkas
Stjepka asked to find two sets of tools, one for rough work and one for calibration. Not only will the wizard pay for the tool, but he can also provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or armor.
Tools: bring tools to Barkas
Stupka asked to find a set of tools for rough work. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can also provide a more serious upgrade to a weapon or body armour.
Tools: bring tools to Barkas
Stjepka asked to find two sets of tools, one for fine work and one for calibration. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can also provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or armour.
Tools: bring tools to Barkas
Stupka has asked to find a set of tools for precision work. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armour.
Tools: Bring Tools to Barkas
Stupka asked to find a set of tools for calibration. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armour.
Tools: Bring Tools to Barkas

Stjepka has asked to find three sets of tools: for rough work, for precision work plus a calibration set. The wizard will not only pay for the tool, but can provide a more serious upgrade to the weapon or body armour.
Special order: pick up
The order has been delivered, you must pick it up from the Skillet.
Special order: waiting for delivery.
Order has been placed. You must wait until the painter delivers your item.
Join the Stalkers: Speak to the Shaman
Speak with Shaman to join the Free Stalkers Clan.
Entering the Zone: Talk to Borland.
Re-plan with your partner to break into the Zone through a roadblock.
Breaking into the Zone: Show IDs
Show the fake IDs to the checkpoint inspectors.
Breaking into the Zone: Enter the Zone
Walk through a checkpoint into the Zone
Payment: Collect money
Lieutenant Colonel Kolyazin gave a deadline of only two days. During this time to earn 30,000 rubles.
Payment: Pay for freedom.
The money has been collected. Now they need to give it to Kolyazin and take Borland out of the roadblock
Payment: Kolyazin's errands
To free Borland you need to run a couple of errands Koliazin
Payment: talk to Borland.
Tell Borland the good news that he is free.
Payment: Leave the roadblock.
Payment for the freedom is paid in full, you can now quietly leave the unfortunate roadblock.
Get your loot.
Get your loot from the safe at the exit of the checkpoint.
Safe Haven: Getting to the Rookie Village
It is relatively safe in the Zone only in the larger camps. It makes sense to get to the closest of them, the Rookie Village.
First pennies: Talk to the Dog.
Dog is an experienced stalker from the Rookie Village. He can help you earn money.
First Penny: Walk behind the railway embankment.
Find a way to get to the other side of the embankment.
First Penny: Find a missing stalker or his belongings.
The rookie stalker Dog asked to find was last contacted near the train.
First pennies: Report your find to Dog
Give the found items to the Dog or keep them.
Job for Beginner: Talk to Skidan.
Talk to the local Trogovian, Skidan may be able to get you some work.
Novice Job: Find an Artifact
Skidan offers to pass the proficiency test and get an artifact "Crystal" or "Fireball" or "Eye". It's pretty risky business, so you can turn it down.
Novice Job: Bringing an artifact.
Give the found artifact to Skidan and get a reward.
Talk to the Dog.
The Dog has asked to come up and ask him about a case.
Sweep: Find a sweep team
Several stalkers have decided to secure the neighborhood. We need to help them.
Sweep: Sweep the area
There are a lot of wild boars and dogs in the area. You must reduce their numbers.
Sweep: Report back
Get a reward from the Dog.
Insurance: talk to the Hound.
Find out what kind of help is required by the Dog.
Insurance: Get to the Anomaly.
Walk with the Dog to the nearest anomalous field.
Insurance: Watch Dog's back.
Cover Dog from the mutants while he is researching the anomaly.
Safeguard: Find an artifact in the anomaly
Using the detector and bolts, find the artifact in the anomaly field.
Insure: Show Dog the find
Show the Medusa artifact found in the anomaly to the Dog
Insurance: Go back to the camp
Continue on to the newcomer camp with Pes.
Talk to the Hound about the job
The Dog has promised to fit the job in.
Hunting: Find the hunter.
To the east of the ATP is waiting for a hunter nicknamed Leshy.
Hunt: Kill a wild boar.
You and Leshny have to hunt and kill a brown boar.
Hunting: Save Leshev.
Leshny was wounded by a boar, you should share a medical kit with him.
Hunt: Escort the wounded man to the ATP
Leshny is wounded and cannot carry a weapon himself. You must take him to the nearest medic.
Hunting: Speak to the leader of the Free Stalkers.
Tell Shaman what happened.
Talk to the Shaman about a job.
Shaman offers to make extra money, discuss details.
Stalking: Follow Sawyer.
Clandestinely follow Sawyer, find out where he hid the stolen loot from the clan's cache.
Surveillance: Catch Sawyer off guard.
Expose Sawyer, talk to him about the stolen cache.
Stalking: Talking to the Shaman.
Trick Shaman into giving Sawyer the left coordinates of the cache.
Fighting for territory: Talk to Cousteau.
Talk to Cousteau's trader, about the job.
Fighting for territory: Destroy bandits.
Eliminate the bandits stationed near the ATP. This helps to stop the looting of Stalkers who return with loot to the base.
Fighting for your territory: Get the reward
Collect your reward for eliminating bandits from the merchant.
Naughty Business: Talking to Skidan.
A local merchant wants to ask you something. Best not to refuse.
Dirty Deed: Take a parcel to the ATP.
This mission is the easiest of all tasks: deliver the parcel to the stalker.
Nifty Business: Decide the fate of the parcel
Split the content of the parcel or deliver it to the address.
Naughty Business: Report to Skidan
Getting paid for the job from Skidan.
Dumb thing to do: Make up an excuse
Tell Skidan about the imaginary thugs who stole the package.
Serious business: Talk to Skidan.
Skidan wants to offer some serious work, talk to him about the details.
Serious business: Ask the stalkers about the debtor.
Find out where the missing debtor stalker was last seen.
Serious Business: Investigate possible Debtor's hideouts.
Debtor's stalker may be hiding out at the grain elevator, in the house across from the farm.
Serious Thing: Search a dead body.
Search the corpse of a bandit.
Serious business: Search the last hideout at the checkpoint
The message on the PDA of the murdered bandit, says Shmyga and his company went to the checkpoint in the direction of the dump.
Serious business: Run or fight.
Take out the debtor's accomplices or go back to Skidan.
Serious Business: Talk to Skidan.
Talk to Skidan about the case.
Serious Business: Meet Mercenaries
You must bring the mercenaries an advance payment.
Serious Business: Kill Shmyga
Kill Shmyga and take from him the keys to the safe where the case with the money is hidden.
Serious Business: Taking the money box.
Open the safe and retrieve the cash case.
Serious Deed: Get reward.
Return to Skidan to drop the case and collect your reward.
Serious Business: Find a way to get the case back.
Now that Shmyga is in the Bandit base, there is no easy way to retrieve his loot.
Gop-Stop: Talk to The Mouthpiece.
The leader of the bandits The Mouthpiece wants to offer a job, ignore his offer or discuss the details with him.
Gop-Stop: Rob a stalker
Ambush a stalker returning from a trip.
Gop Stop: Kill or Release Stalker
Decide what to do with the stalker.
Gop-Stop: Report to the Speech Therapist.
Get a reward from the boss.
Mechanik for Bandits: Find a Mechanik.
The Mohawk asks to find a mechanic for his brigade.
Mechanik for Bandits: Talk to The Mohawk.
Talk to the speech therapist to find a machinist
Gunslinger for Gangsters: Talk to the Mentor.
Report back to the Speech Therapist on the task
Crime Business: Talk to the Speech Therapist.
Apparently the Speech Therapist is having a showdown with one of his own
Crime Business: Talk to Shmyga.
Convince Shmyga to pay into the joint.
Crime Business: Punish Shmyga
Undercut the enemy
Crime Business: Retrieve his belongings
Get your belongings out of the safe
Crime Business: Talk to the speech therapist
Talk to the speech therapist about the situation
Talk to the Dog about the job
Dog offers to work, discuss details.
Guide: talk to Student
Talk to Student about going to the ATP.
Guide: Guide the Student to the bus station.
Walk Student to the stalker base at the railroad station.
Guide: Talk to Student
Talk to the Student.
Guide: go back to the Hound to get your reward.
Collect the rest of the Student's fee from Dog.
Night Hunt: Wait for night
Wait until nightfall to hunt down the mutant who is terrorizing the stalker camp.
Night Hunt: Kill a mutant.
Kill the pseudo-mutant that is terrorizing the stalker camp.
Night Hunt: Get Reward
Get a reward from Pathogenic for killing a dangerous mutant.
Talk to Borland
Talk to Borland.
Talk to Pathogenic.
ATP bar bartender offers a well-paying job.
Missing contact: Cross the railway embankment
The missing contact has gone missing somewhere behind the railway embankment, near the bandit base.
Missing contact: Follow the bandit
Follow the bandit Sleeper, try not to scare him off.
Missing Messenger: Search the Bandit
Search the corpse of the bandit Sleeper.
Missing Liaison : foil the Bandit's plan.
The bandits have decided to finish off the captured freedom fighter to stop the mayhem.
Missing Contact: Tell Pathogenic what happened.
The messenger is dead, tell Patogenych that bandits are involved, tell about the captured freedom fighter.
Saving the freedom fighter: save the freedom fighter
Bandits near the ruins are holding a freedom fighter captive, rescue him from captivity.
Rescuing the freedom fighter: Tell Pathogenic what happened.
Tell about the suicide of a freedom fighter.
The mystery of the freedom fighter: Search the corpse.
Search the corpse of the Liberator's suicide.
Libertarian's Secret: Unlock the PDA
Go to the mechanic Stoepka, perhaps he can unlock the PDA.
Liberator's Secret: Wait for the PDA to be unlocked.
It will take some time for Stoepka to unlock the PDA. While he unlocks it, help the Shaman with one thing.
The mystery of the freedom fighter: Get the PDA.
Enough time has passed, it's been a long time since Steppe unlocked the PDA.
The Liberator's Secret: Find out where Stjepka's gone.
Stjepka is missing somewhere, ask Patogenic where he could have gone.
The Liberator's Secret: To get to the elevator
Patogenych says that he heard from the walkers that they saw Stepka going to the elevator.
Svoboda's secret: Search the corpse
Stjepka is dead. Search his corpse.
Strange Business: Talk to the Shaman
Find out what kind of help the Shaman needs.
Strange Business: Talk to Skidan.
Shaman asks to go to Skidan for something.
Odd Business: Return to the Shaman.
Take an unknown piece of equipment to the Shaman.
Talk to Borland.
Tell Borland about your adventures: about the mysterious monolithic man in freedom form and about the mysterious artifact.
Visiting Bandits: Speak to the Speech Therapist.
Ask the leader of the bandits about the freedom monolith.
Back to the bandits: Go back to Borland.
Bandits denied help, go back with nothing to Borland
Outlaw Guest: Waiting for help.
Waiting for help from Borland.
Visiting Bandits: Talk to Borland.
Talk to Borland.
Dungeons: Find Watchmaker.
Stalker Watchmaker lives on the outskirts of the newbie village.
Dungeon: Talk to the Dog.
The Watchman isn't at home, so maybe the Dog knows where to find him.
Dungeon: Meet the Watchdog.
The Dog tells us the Watchdog is currently returning from the Swamp, so you should meet him and ask about the dungeons.
Dungeon: Help the Watchmaker
Help the Watchmaker with the mutants.
Dungeon: Speak to the Watchmaker.
Ask the Watchmaker about a dungeon.
Dungeon: Talk to Borland.
Tell Borland about the dungeon.
Dungeon: Go to the dungeon.
Go underground with Borland.
Dungeon Exploration: Follow Borland.
Follow Borland.
Dungeon Exploration: Speak to Skidan.
This is the encounter, ask Skidan about dungeons.
Dungeon Exploration: Speak to Borland
Discuss Skidan's suggestion.
Dungeon Exploration: Get out of the dungeon
Get out of a dungeon through a tube.
Dungeon Exploration: Speak to the Clockmaker.
Find out about the lab from the Watchmaker and get the access code.
Dungeon Exploration: Speak to Skidan.
Accept Skidan's demands and ask him for the laboratory access code.
Dungeon Exploration: Speak to Borland
Talk to Borland about getting down to the lab.
Dungeon Exploration: Follow Borland
Follow Borland into the lab.
Dungeon Exploration: Go down to the lab.
Open door to lab, access code: 7200.
Dungeon Exploration: Descend into the lab
Descend into the lab.
You are now in the army: Chimera's Den
Sneak into the Chimera's Den.
You're in the army now: Kill a chimera or...
Kill a chimera or...
You're in the army now: Get the PDA
Get the Warrant Officer's PDA with valuable military information
Now you're in the army: Report to Kolyazin
Return the PDA.
You're now in the army: Find the Deserter
Find the Deserter. Ask around at Cordon.
You're in the army now: Report to Kolyazin.
Tell the truth or report the Deserter's death.
Find %s for Steppe.
You need to bring tools to Stoepke, so he can upgrade his equipment.

You know, bro, I'm actually not a bad technician. And weapons and armor know how to repair, even upgrade some or other do! Or rather, I would do them, if I had proper tools. But where to get them here? Maybe you can help me get a simple kit, huh?
I need a tool kit for rough work. It's got to have tools and oils for working with guns. If you can get me one, I'd appreciate it, even pay you. I guess.
All right, man! Oh, I'm sorry, I can't pay you. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for Stoepke.
We need to get Stoepka some tools for his delicate work. He needs a more complete set in order to do more complex gear upgrades.
Hey, dude, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Can you help me out, buddy?
I need tools to do some fine work. Should have everything I need in there. You'd be like a brother to me if you got it!

Wow, man, thanks, bro! Now I'm gonna be rich for sure. Damn it, I'm gonna be successful... Unless, of course, I miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
Find %s for Stoepke.
We need to get %s for Stoepka. He needs a unique kit to do even more sophisticated gear upgrades.
Hey, man, if you find something good, I'll give you a discount.
I need calibration tools. They should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get them!

No hoo...! Damn, thanks, bro! Now I'm gonna be rich for sure. Goddamn it, I'm gonna be successful... Unless, of course, I miss this chance. But I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, mate.
Find for Barkas %s.
We need to get tools for Barkas so he can upgrade his gear.

You know, bro, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can mend weapons and armour, and even make upgrades of sorts. Or rather, I would do them if I had proper tools. But where to get them here? Maybe you can help me get a simple kit, huh?
I need a tool kit for rough work. It's got to have tools and oils for working with guns. If you can get me one, I'd appreciate it, even pay you. I guess.
All right, man! Oh, I'm sorry, I can't pay you. But I can give you a good discount!
Find for Barkas %s.
You need to get Barkas some tools for fine work. He needs a more complete set in order to do more complex gear upgrades.
Hey man, if you agree to get me a more complete kit, you'll get an even bigger discount. Can you help me out, buddy?
I need tools to do some fine work. Should have everything I need in there. You'd be like a brother to me if you got it!

Wow, man, thanks, bro! Now I'm gonna be rich for sure. Damn it, I'm gonna be successful... Unless, of course, I miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, mate.
Find for Barkas %s.
You need to get Barkas the %s. He needs a unique kit to do even more sophisticated gear upgrades.
Hey, kid, if you find something good, I'll give you a discount.
I need calibration tools. They should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get them!

No hoo...! Damn, thanks, bro! Now I'm gonna be rich for sure. Goddamn it, I'm gonna be successful... Unless, of course, I miss this chance. But I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
